trans-unit.source: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.
trans-unit.target: 他的任务已成为灰暗的朝圣路途，在赞迪卡各处遭奥札奇袭击的哨站之间前进。 但他依旧独身前行，一如每日坚持升起的朝阳。

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 每当所结附的生物进行攻击或阻挡时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: "If destiny's champions have arisen to fight the Ancient Ones, then let me, too, do my part."\n—Ravuel of Graypelt
trans-unit.target: 「如果连天命斗士都已起身挑战远古先祖，那么也让我尽自己份内的心力。」 ～灰皮的勒彼尔

trans-unit.source: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.
trans-unit.target: 随着晶石开始组合成巨大的奥札奇超结构体，狮鹫担心其空域将会随着巨石彼此碰撞而消灭，只得寻找新的领土。

trans-unit.source: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.
trans-unit.target: 大地坏灭，城市尽毁，死伤惨重；唯一语足志：胜利。

trans-unit.source: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.

trans-unit.source: As they awakened, the Eldrazi reasserted their mastery over all of Zendikar's natural forces.
trans-unit.target: 随着奥札奇醒转，他们再次对所有赞迪卡自然势力宣扬自己的主权。

trans-unit.source: Guard Gomazoa
trans-unit.target: 卫士格玛佐雅

trans-unit.resname: ROE·70 | Guard Gomazoa | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender, flying\nPrevent all combat damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 守军，飞行 防止将对CARDNAME造成之所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.
trans-unit.target: 它在马钦迪战壕附近的哨站徘徊不去，无意间形成了另一道防线。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·71 | Hada Spy Patrol | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hada Spy Patrol
trans-unit.target: 哈达巡侦员

trans-unit.resname: ROE·71 | Hada Spy Patrol | Card Text | Paragraphs

CARDNAME is unblockable.

trans-unit.source: Halimar Wavewatch
trans-unit.target: 哈利玛波涛守卫

trans-unit.resname: ROE·72 | Halimar Wavewatch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.source: Jwari Scuttler
trans-unit.target: 爪尔凿孔蟹

trans-unit.source: "Yeah, they've got a lot of meat. The only downside to eating 'em is that you often find human bones and body parts inside."\n—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad
trans-unit.target: 「没错，他们身上肉很多。 吃他们唯一的缺点是：你经常会在里面找到人骨与残躯。」 ～希隆迪海牧民捷比

trans-unit.source: Lay Bare
trans-unit.target: 披露

trans-unit.resname: ROE·74 | Lay Bare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Look at its controller's hand.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 检视其操控者的手牌。

trans-unit.source: "It's good to learn from your failures, but I prefer to learn from the failures of others."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「从你的失败中学习是很不错，但我更想从别人的失误中学习。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Lighthouse Chronologist
trans-unit.target: 灯塔时代学者

trans-unit.resname: ROE·75 | Lighthouse Chronologist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Level up {U} ({U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 4-6
2/4

LEVEL 7+
3/5
At the beginning of each end step, if it's not your turn, take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 升级{U} （{U}：在其上放置一个等级指示物。 升级的时机视同法术。） 等级4-6 2/4 等级7+ 3/5 在每个结束步骤开始时，若目前不是你的回合，则在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Observer
trans-unit.target: 情资人鱼

trans-unit.resname: ROE·76 | Merfolk Observer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标牌手的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.source: "The structure gets bigger every hour, with hedrons coalescing even deep under the surface. If I could only get inside . . . ."
trans-unit.target: 「结构体每小时都不断增大，来源的晶石也越来越靠近地底。 只要我能跑到里面去...。」

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Skyscout
trans-unit.target: 空侦人鱼

trans-unit.resname: ROE·77 | Merfolk Skyscout | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击或阻挡时，重置目标永久物。

trans-unit.source: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."
trans-unit.target: 「伊美黎是个美丽谎言、用来掩盖伊莫库可怕面貌的虚像。 我只希望能发掘埋在更深层的真相。」

trans-unit.source: Mnemonic Wall
trans-unit.target: 记忆墙

trans-unit.resname: ROE·78 | Mnemonic Wall | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 守军 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could."\n—Mzali, Lighthouse archmage
trans-unit.target: 「如果可以的话，真想用它们来建造整座堡垒。」 ～灯塔大法师马闸离

trans-unit.source: Narcolepsy
trans-unit.target: 嗜睡症

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 在每个维持开始时，若所结附的生物并未横置，则横置它。

trans-unit.source: "It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."\n—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「它睡着的样子真可爱，不是吗？ 其实它还是一样的可恶，但至少它目前没在想着要杀掉我们。」 ～塔晋息法师诺言达

trans-unit.source: Phantasmal Abomination
trans-unit.target: 幻象憎恨兽

trans-unit.resname: ROE·80 | Phantasmal Abomination | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nWhen CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 守军 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: Create an illusion so strong that it becomes another's reality, and you can become the master of all.
trans-unit.target: 如果所制造的幻象强大到能成为他人的现实，你就能成为万物的主宰。

trans-unit.source: Reality Spasm
trans-unit.target: 实相抽搐

trans-unit.resname: ROE·81 | Reality Spasm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one — Tap X target permanents; or untap X target permanents.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～横置X个目标永久物；或重置X个目标永久物。

trans-unit.source: From the moment the first Eldrazi spawn squirmed free, everything on Zendikar took on an adjusted meaning, a new slant toward or away from the waking giants.
trans-unit.target: 打自第一个奥札奇后裔在大地自由蠕行以来，赞迪卡的一切都有了不同意义，而这些醒转巨人就是新的基准。

trans-unit.source: Recurring Insight
trans-unit.target: 洞察再现

trans-unit.resname: ROE·82 | Recurring Insight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in target opponent's hand.\nRebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 抓等同于目标对手之手牌数量的牌。 弹回 （如果你从你手上施放此牌，于它结算时将之放逐。 在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放此牌，且不须支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.source: Regress
trans-unit.target: 回归

trans-unit.source: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Never look too deep, where the waters turn dark. What the sea has hidden there may not stay down forever."\n—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad
trans-unit.target: 「别误入漆黑的水底。 大海藏在该处的东西不一定会永远待在那边。」 ～希隆迪海牧民捷比

trans-unit.source: Renegade Doppelganger
trans-unit.target: 反叛化妖

trans-unit.resname: ROE·84 | Renegade Doppelganger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have CARDNAME become a copy of that creature until end of turn. (If it does, it loses this ability for the rest of the turn.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以令CARDNAME成为该生物的复制品直到回合结束。 （如果它如此作，则它在本回合剩下的时段内会失去此异能。）

trans-unit.source: To truly know a creature, slither a mile in its tentacles.
trans-unit.target: 要真正了解一个生物，得在他触手中滑行一哩。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·85 | Sea Gate Oracle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sea Gate Oracle
trans-unit.target: 海户先知

trans-unit.resname: ROE·85 | Sea Gate Oracle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的两张牌。 将其中一张置于你的手上，另一张置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·85 | Sea Gate Oracle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The secret entrance should be near."
trans-unit.target: 「秘密入口应该就在附近。」

trans-unit.source: See Beyond
trans-unit.target: 远见

trans-unit.resname: ROE·86 | See Beyond | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后从你手上将一张牌洗入你的牌库。

trans-unit.source: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.
trans-unit.target: 远古知识锁在疯狂心灵中，就与深埋地底下一样安全。

trans-unit.source: Shared Discovery
trans-unit.target: 共享发现

trans-unit.resname: ROE·87 | Shared Discovery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, tap four untapped creatures you control.\nDraw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 横置四个由你操控且未横置的生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Riches must be divided, but real wealth can be shared.
trans-unit.target: 金银必须分配，但真正的财富可以共享。

trans-unit.source: Skywatcher Adept
trans-unit.target: 空卫能手

trans-unit.resname: ROE·88 | Skywatcher Adept | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
2/2
Flying
LEVEL 3+
4/2
Flying
trans-unit.target: 升级{3} （{3}：在其上放置一个等级指示物。 升级的时机视同法术。） 等级1-2 2/2 飞行 等级3+ 4/2 飞行

trans-unit.resname: ROE·89 | Sphinx of Magosi | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphinx of Magosi
trans-unit.target: 马格西史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: ROE·89 | Sphinx of Magosi | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {2}{U}：抓一张牌，然后在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·89 | Sphinx of Magosi | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."
trans-unit.target: 「谜语只不过是对付卑微心灵的陷阱，以终能理解的承诺为诱饵。」

trans-unit.source: Surrakar Spellblade
trans-unit.target: 咒刃苏拉卡

trans-unit.resname: ROE·90 | Surrakar Spellblade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 每当CARDNAME对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓X张牌，X为其上的充电指示物数量。

trans-unit.source: Training Grounds
trans-unit.target: 训练场

trans-unit.resname: ROE·91 | Training Grounds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost up to {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物之起动式异能至多减少{2}来起动。 此效应无法让起动异能所需的法术力费用少于一点法术力。

trans-unit.source: Under the master's eye, skills are honed sharper and spells cut deeper.
trans-unit.target: 在师父的指导下，技巧更加熟练，咒语也更加强劲。

trans-unit.source: Unified Will
trans-unit.target: 齐心一致

trans-unit.resname: ROE·92 | Unified Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控的生物数量多于该咒语操控者的，则反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: "We're glad to be of service—to be an audience to your failure."\n—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「我们乐意为您效劳～替您的失败作见证。」 ～塔晋息法师麦札席尔

trans-unit.source: Venerated Teacher
trans-unit.target: 景仰教师

trans-unit.resname: ROE·93 | Venerated Teacher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在每个由你操控、且具升级异能的生物上放置两个等级指示物。

trans-unit.source: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."
trans-unit.target: 「学生们，难以测度之物正朝我们而来。 我相信你们不会错过这良机。」

trans-unit.source: Arrogant Bloodlord
trans-unit.target: 傲慢血领

trans-unit.resname: ROE·94 | Arrogant Bloodlord | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with power 1 or less, destroy CARDNAME at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当力量为1或更少的生物阻挡CARDNAME、或被CARDNAME所阻挡，则在战斗结束时消灭CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "I would rather take my own head than be thwarted by a presumptuous wretch with a shield and a dream."
trans-unit.target: 「与其让这拿着护盾、抱着梦想的放肆劣货在面前叫嚷，我还宁愿砍掉自己的头。」

trans-unit.resname: ROE·95 | Bala Ged Scorpion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bala Ged Scorpion
trans-unit.target: 巴勒格蝎子

trans-unit.resname: ROE·95 | Bala Ged Scorpion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以消灭目标力量为1或更少的生物。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·95 | Bala Ged Scorpion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.
trans-unit.target: 速度快且致命，又爱盯上弱小且体虚者。

trans-unit.source: Baneful Omen
trans-unit.target: 有害预兆

trans-unit.resname: ROE·96 | Baneful Omen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, each opponent loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以展示你的牌库顶牌。 若你如此作，每位对手各失去与该牌之总法术力费用等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: "Ah, again it does not bode well for you."
trans-unit.target: 「啊，它又不给你好兆头了。」

trans-unit.source: Bloodrite Invoker
trans-unit.target: 血仪召现师

trans-unit.resname: ROE·97 | Bloodrite Invoker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: {8}：目标牌手失去3点生命且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption."\n—*The Invokers' Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「巢窝血脉横行世界，每种的特征都与三位先祖中的一位相符，也都能当作盲目吞噬的研究对象。」 ～《召现师传说》

trans-unit.source: Bloodthrone Vampire
trans-unit.target: 血座吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: ROE·98 | Bloodthrone Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.
trans-unit.target: 有些人类自愿献上鲜血，希望这能增强吸血鬼家族的力量，好将奥札奇击退。

trans-unit.source: Cadaver Imp
trans-unit.target: 尸首小恶魔

trans-unit.resname: ROE·99 | Cadaver Imp | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.
trans-unit.target: 在死尸僵硬之前，必须先把嘴给撬开； 否则返回的灵魂会找不到入口。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·100 | Consume the Meek | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Consume the Meek
trans-unit.target: 吞噬弱者

trans-unit.resname: ROE·100 | Consume the Meek | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有总法术力费用为3或更少的生物。 它们不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·100 | Consume the Meek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why does it destroy? It does, and to talk of reasons wastes time and breath."\n—Nirthu, lone missionary
trans-unit.target: 「它为何要破坏？ 它就是要破坏，说明理由只是浪费时间与气力。」 ～独行传教士讷图

trans-unit.source: Consuming Vapors
trans-unit.target: 化骨毒气

trans-unit.resname: ROE·101 | Consuming Vapors | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.\nRebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个生物。 你获得等同于该生物防御力的生命。 弹回 （如果你从你手上施放此牌，于它结算时将之放逐。 在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放此牌，且不须支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.source: Contaminated Ground
trans-unit.target: 污化地界

trans-unit.resname: ROE·102 | Contaminated Ground | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land is a Swamp.\nWhenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 所结附的地是沼泽。 每当所结附的地成为横置时，其操控者失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The Na Plateau is lost. Do not ask what happened, and never return there."\n—Nirthu, lone missionary
trans-unit.target: 「纳高原已经完了。别追问到底发生什么事，也别再回去那边。」 ～独行传教士讷图

trans-unit.source: Corpsehatch
trans-unit.target: 尸囊育种

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature. Put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。 将两个0/1无色奥札奇／后裔衍生物放进战场。 它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.resname: ROE·104 | Curse of Wizardry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of Wizardry
trans-unit.target: 术法诅咒

trans-unit.resname: ROE·104 | Curse of Wizardry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nWhenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种颜色。 每当牌手施放该色的咒语时，该牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: ROE·104 | Curse of Wizardry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We must all push through the pain to heal our world."\n—Ayli, Kamsa cleric
trans-unit.target: 「我们必得忍受痛苦，才能治愈这世界。」 ～肯莎僧侣艾栗

trans-unit.source: Death Cultist
trans-unit.target: 死亡教众

trans-unit.resname: ROE·105 | Death Cultist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Death inevitably seduces all who study it.
trans-unit.target: 死亡总诱惑着研究它的人。

trans-unit.source: Demonic Appetite
trans-unit.target: 恶魔胃口

trans-unit.target: 对付糙节兽务必要一击致命，否则他会很乐意教你该怎样作。

trans-unit.target: 玖瑞加妖精从未要求巨魔离开其领土。 他们只是将集体之力量赋予它身上，使它忍不住要展开快乐的暴冲旅程。

trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.source: "This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice."\n—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「这个才不过一岁，但我们所设下的绝佳猎食练习机会已经骗不到他。」 ～姆拉撒探险队的莎米勒

trans-unit.source: Tajuru Preserver
trans-unit.target: 特裘如存护师

trans-unit.resname: ROE·211 | Tajuru Preserver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.
trans-unit.target: 由对手所操控的咒语或异能无法让你牺牲永久物。

trans-unit.source: "No more blood shall be spilled to satisfy another's deluded lust for power."
trans-unit.target: 「不该再有鲜血为了他人的力量妄想而平白流下。」

trans-unit.source: Vengevine
trans-unit.target: 复仇藤蔓

trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 每当你施放咒语时，如果这是你本回合施放的第二个生物咒语，你可以将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.
trans-unit.target: 就算只留下一小片根，它也会精神十足地再度冒出来。

trans-unit.source: Wildheart Invoker
trans-unit.target: 蛮心召现师

trans-unit.resname: ROE·213 | Wildheart Invoker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {8}：目标生物得+5/+5且获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."\n—*The Invokers' Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「我们所熟悉的生活已面临存亡关头。 面对意图将之夺走者，我们必须展现力量。」 ～《召现师传说》

trans-unit.resname: ROE·214 | Sarkhan the Mad | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sarkhan the Mad
trans-unit.target: 狂人萨坎

trans-unit.resname: ROE·214 | Sarkhan the Mad | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: 0: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. CARDNAME deals damage to himself equal to that card's converted mana cost.\n-2: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then that player puts a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.\n-4: Each Dragon creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player.
trans-unit.target: 0：展示你的牌库顶牌，并将它放入你手上。 CARDNAME对本身造成伤害，其数量等同于该牌的总法术力费用。 -2：目标生物的操控者将它牺牲，然后该牌手将一个5/5红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生物放进战场。 -4：由你操控的每个龙生物对目标牌手造成伤害，其数量各等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.source: Angelheart Vial
trans-unit.target: 天使心瓶

trans-unit.resname: ROE·215 | Angelheart Vial | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many charge counters on CARDNAME.\n{2}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from CARDNAME: You gain 2 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你受到伤害时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置等量的充电指示物。 {2}，{T}，从CARDNAME上移去四个充电指示物：你获得2点生命并抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: It holds a whisper from Iona: "Persevere."
trans-unit.target: 里面盛装着艾欧娜的细语：「不屈不挠。」

trans-unit.source: Dreamstone Hedron
trans-unit.target: 梦想晶石

trans-unit.resname: ROE·216 | Dreamstone Hedron | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.\n{3}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{3}到你的法术力池中。 {3}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.
trans-unit.target: 只有透过奥札奇心灵的歪曲思考路径，才能敲开晶石来汲取其间力量。

trans-unit.source: Enatu Golem
trans-unit.target: 依拿图魔像

trans-unit.resname: ROE·217 | Enatu Golem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: Golems conjured from the debris of Enatu Temple provided a sturdy but expendable first line of defense against the Eldrazi.
trans-unit.target: 用依拿图殿堂残骸所召唤出的魔像，提供了对抗奥札奇时坚实又可当炮灰的第一道防线。

trans-unit.source: Hedron Matrix
trans-unit.target: 晶石间质

trans-unit.resname: ROE·218 | Hedron Matrix | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its converted mana cost.\nEquip {4}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+X/+X，X为其总法术力费用。 佩带{4}

trans-unit.source: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.
trans-unit.target: 晶石随着奥札奇苏醒，组成的超构造体放射庞大魔力。

trans-unit.source: Keening Stone
trans-unit.target: 恸哭石

trans-unit.resname: ROE·219 | Keening Stone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}：目标牌手将其牌库顶的X张牌置入其坟墓场，X为该牌手坟墓场中牌的数量。

trans-unit.source: As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.
trans-unit.target: 它转动的尖削杂音有如不断增强的亡者之声，让心灵为之裂解。

trans-unit.source: Ogre's Cleaver
trans-unit.target: 食人魔砍刀

trans-unit.resname: ROE·220 | Ogre's Cleaver | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +5/+0.\nEquip {5}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+5/+0。 佩带{5}

trans-unit.source: She adopted the weapon of the slave-lord Kazuul, and with it, all his cruelty.
trans-unit.target: 她继承了奴隶头子克卒的武器，以及用它展现的所有残酷。

trans-unit.source: Pennon Blade
trans-unit.target: 旗帜刃

trans-unit.resname: ROE·221 | Pennon Blade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.\nEquip {4}
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个生物，佩带此武具的生物便得+1/+1。 佩带{4}

trans-unit.source: Draped with the pennon of a fallen outpost, the sword came to symbolize the peoples of Zendikar becoming one.
trans-unit.target: 此剑饰以陷落的哨站旗帜，象征着赞迪卡的人民齐心合力。

trans-unit.source: Prophetic Prism
trans-unit.target: 预视棱镜

trans-unit.resname: ROE·222 | Prophetic Prism | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\n{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 {1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."
trans-unit.target: 「找到它的探险家没卖到个好价钱。 他只不过变成有钱人而已。」

trans-unit.source: Reinforced Bulwark
trans-unit.target: 强化堡垒

trans-unit.resname: ROE·223 | Reinforced Bulwark | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\n{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
trans-unit.target: 守军 {T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对你造成的1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Built of wood and iron. Held together by hope and prayer.
trans-unit.target: 以木材与钢铁制造； 用希望与祈祷组装。

trans-unit.source: Runed Servitor
trans-unit.target: 符文随侍

trans-unit.resname: ROE·224 | Runed Servitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
trans-unit.target: 塔帖立遗迹让学者思索数百年却找不到解答。 其秘密一直就躲在个刻着符文的头里面。

trans-unit.source: Sphinx-Bone Wand
trans-unit.target: 史芬斯骨杖

trans-unit.resname: ROE·225 | Sphinx-Bone Wand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on CARDNAME. If you do, CARDNAME deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 若你如此作，则CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于CARDNAME上充电指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Its host's final curse lies captured within.
trans-unit.target: 里面埋藏着其主子的临终诅咒。

trans-unit.source: Warmonger's Chariot
trans-unit.target: 战争贩子战车

trans-unit.resname: ROE·226 | Warmonger's Chariot | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2.\nAs long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.\nEquip {3}
The best defense is a good offense.
trans-unit.target: 最佳的防御就是有效的攻击。

trans-unit.source: Eldrazi Temple
trans-unit.target: 奥札奇殿堂

trans-unit.resname: ROE·227 | Eldrazi Temple | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {T}：加{2}到你的法术力池中。 此法术力只能用来施放无色奥札奇咒语，或是起动无色奥札奇的起动式异能。

trans-unit.source: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.
trans-unit.target: 每座殿堂都是通往可怕未来的门户。

trans-unit.source: Evolving Wilds
trans-unit.target: 成形野地

trans-unit.resname: ROE·228 | Evolving Wilds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进战场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.
trans-unit.target: 任一世界都是个有机体，能让新的地成长。 有些只是作得比其他的都快。
